attributes.background: Stop energy companies making a profit from the NHS

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Offering a reduction for NHS sites would be a decision for utility providers, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a reduction of the price cap for gas and electricity during the lockdown:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312363
